website_summaries.verdict: Modified trikes for special needs children can be prohibitively expensive, which makes the Mobito an excellent and affordable alternative. We believe the chainless design improves rider safety, even if it requires some additional effort.
pros: Rear-wheel steering is good for special needs riders
Rated for ages four and up
cons: Tires feel unbalanced, making stability an issue

customer_reviews.title: Great to see her get a little bit of normalcy ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this bike last Christmas for my daughter with joint and muscle disability. She loves riding the bike and is able to whip it around with ease after some trial and error on the steering bars. great to see her get a little bit of normalcy as most 8-9 yr olds like her friends and other kids in the neighborhood. Update: 4.15.2019 Still going strong, 5yr old son now rides the bike too. 11yr old special needs daughter still rides bit looking for something bigger to accommodate her growing length.
customer_reviews.author: Kareem Omar

customer_reviews.title: This product arrived damaged. It was so close to ...
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived damaged. It was so close to Christmas I couldn't return it. And the petals keep falling off of it. It can also be very dangerous. My child flipped it completely over and it landed on top of her.
customer_reviews.author: janet lewis

customer_reviews.title: Neat idea, not good quality
customer_reviews.text: It is nearly impossible to adjust the bike as a child grows, and is a poor design. If they fixed this, it could be a neat bike.
customer_reviews.author: amazonreader

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, attractive, easy to assemble, cool trike
customer_reviews.text: On our case, perfect bike for a five year old who lost some abilities due to illness - but still wanted to ride a bike.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Back wheel bearings were not adjusted correctly, which I ...
customer_reviews.text: Back wheel bearings were not adjusted correctly, which I did myself, and I paid $20 to have the front tire trimmed. To much of a hassle after putting it together to send it back
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: Flag without a Flag Pole
customer_reviews.text: Product seems pretty good. I do have two issues.....#1 it was shipped missing one nut that I had to go purchase from the hardware store, and #2....comes with a safety flag but no pole to mount it on the bike....makes no sense....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice bike - poor sizing
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this bike/trike for our 5 yr with Rett Syndrome with the intent of modifying a few things. The bike is durable and fun, however, the sizing was off. Our Daughter is 38" tall and the specs indicated it was adjustable down to 36" - not so.
customer_reviews.author: John G. Foster

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My little girl has CP. She was able to sail on this bike.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got this for her 5th Birthday. She loves it! So do the neighborhood kids! Very good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: TRACEY NELL

customer_reviews.title: When I purchased it, I thought it was for an adult
customer_reviews.text: I did not see that this bike was for a kid. But I was very thankful to Amazon for taking it back and I found the adult size one that I just can't ride enough.Thank you again Amazon, you have made this customer extremely happy. You have wonderful customer service. And the next time I purchase something like this, I will read more about it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Castillo

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Durable product. Seven year old will enjoy it for years to come. On line purchase was easier than I thought.
customer_reviews.author: carl

product_meta.title: Mobo Mobito Kids 3-Wheel Bike. Recumbent Trike. Childs Cruiser Tricycle
feature_bullets: KIDS RECUMBENT BIKE - Enjoy the outdoors with this easy-to-ride 3-wheeler for kids. Designed for cruising and exercise on flat paved surfaces and gently sloping terrain
NO BALANCE REQUIRED - Low-to-the-ground three-wheel bike frame provides maximum stability. Dual-joystick steering offers smooth maneuverability with simple hand movements
LOW IMPACT EXERCISE - Get a cardiovascular workout with minimal impact. With its secure reclined seat, this exercise bike for kids is fun and easy to ride
KID-SIZE - Adjusts to fit kids up to 4’8” tall. Plus ergonomic reclining-back seat gives you six angle settings. Weight capacity 180 lbs

DURABLE - Hi-ten steel frame. No-maintenance chainless design. Wheels: 16” front, 12” rear. Free-wheel hub, caliper brakes, safety flag. Dimensions: 25 x 21 x 41 inches (47” extended). Weight 32 lbs. Recumbent trike for kids age 4 and up
